positions.subtitle: Infosys
positions.description: Client - Yahoo MailWorked on the core Mail Backend architecture which handles the entire lifecycle of an email. Right from the initial draft phase to sending it and rendering it to the user. Middle tier mail architecture for all the service logic, handling total mail transactions. With almost 1 billion user visits per day (on Yahoo), this project includes high scalability, resilience, and immense tolerance. Tools: Jenkins, Screwdriver, Jira, Yamas Dashboard for monitoring, Splunk, Athenz for authentication.Technologies: JAVA, Bash, MySQL, Hibernate, Mockito, TestNG, HTML, Jersey framework, REST APIs, Google Guice, Google Guava, Maven, Git, Kubereneres, Docker.Cloud: GCP, AWSMy responsibilities included Development and integration of new features (JAVA), end to end testing using TestNG, Mockito, jdk upgrades, fix any bugs in production according to the SLA, monitoring of the worldwide deployments.Writing bash script and screwdriver jobs for deployment and CI/CD. • Development, Unit Testing and Integration Testing using TestNG in a test driven development environment• High code quality standards with multiple tools like Checkstyle, PMD. Spotbugs.• Owning an entire feature cycle, from development, testing, deployment and world-wide push to the deployment monitoring..
positions.title: Specialist Programmer
positions.description_html:
Client - Yahoo Mail
Worked on the core Mail Backend architecture which handles the entire lifecycle of an email. Right from the initial draft phase to sending it and rendering it to the user. Middle tier mail architecture for all the service logic, handling total mail transactions. With almost 1 billion user visits per day (on Yahoo), this project includes high scalability, resilience, and immense tolerance.
Tools: Jenkins, Screwdriver, Jira, Yamas Dashboard for monitoring, Splunk, Athenz for authentication.
Technologies: JAVA, Bash, MySQL, Hibernate, Mockito, TestNG, HTML, Jersey framework, REST APIs, Google Guice, Google Guava, Maven, Git, Kubereneres, Docker.
Cloud: GCP, AWS
My responsibilities included Development and integration of new features (JAVA), end to end testing using TestNG, Mockito, jdk upgrades, fix any bugs in production according to the SLA, monitoring of the worldwide deployments.
Writing bash script and screwdriver jobs for deployment and CI/CD.
• Development, Unit Testing and Integration Testing using TestNG in a test driven development environment
• High code quality standards with multiple tools like Checkstyle, PMD. Spotbugs.
• Owning an entire feature cycle, from development, testing, deployment and world-wide push to the deployment monitoring..

positions.subtitle: Infosys
positions.description: Client - Yahoo IncWorked on a migration framework to migrate 1.2 Million users from a different provider to Yahoo servers. This included moving all the mails, Calendar and contacts of all the users with proper validation at each step. This project was entirely deployed on AWS. I worked on building multiple modules, upgrading multiple existing modules, writing Unit tests and integration tests for end to end testing of the entire framework, writing screwdriver jobs and bash scripts for CI/CD, Integration of Opentelemetry with Yamas dashboard for continuous collation and rendering of massive production metrics, Integration of Splunk with the project for logging and continuous monitoring in production and fixes which were needed along with it.This was an end to end product experience from development to testing to deployment to monitoring till the entire project was completed and all 1.2M users migrated. I added some extra features like automation of the triggering of the migration at regular intervals, automation of generation of reports and all of this accomplished from scratch on AWS. Tools: Screwdriver, Yamas dashboard, Splunk, Jira, Athenz. Technologies: JAVA, Python, Bash, MySQL, Hibernate, Mockito, TestNG, HTML, Jersey framework, REST APIs, Google Guice, Google Guava, Maven, Git, Kubereneres, Docker.Cloud: AWS
positions.title: Specialist Programmer
positions.description_html:
Client - Yahoo Inc
Worked on a migration framework to migrate 1.2 Million users from a different provider to Yahoo servers. This included moving all the mails, Calendar and contacts of all the users with proper validation at each step. This project was entirely deployed on AWS. I worked on building multiple modules, upgrading multiple existing modules, writing Unit tests and integration tests for end to end testing of the entire framework, writing screwdriver jobs and bash scripts for CI/CD, Integration of Opentelemetry with Yamas dashboard for continuous collation and rendering of massive production metrics, Integration of Splunk with the project for logging and continuous monitoring in production and fixes which were needed along with it.
This was an end to end product experience from development to testing to deployment to monitoring till the entire project was completed and all 1.2M users migrated. I added some extra features like automation of the triggering of the migration at regular intervals, automation of generation of reports and all of this accomplished from scratch on AWS.
Tools: Screwdriver, Yamas dashboard, Splunk, Jira, Athenz.
Technologies: JAVA, Python, Bash, MySQL, Hibernate, Mockito, TestNG, HTML, Jersey framework, REST APIs, Google Guice, Google Guava, Maven, Git, Kubereneres, Docker.
Cloud: AWS
